abstract: Court documents suggest that allegations of stock fraud are scuttling the proposed settlement in Facebook’s thorny lawsuit with college social-networking rival ConnectU
snippet: Court documents suggest that allegations of stock fraud are scuttling the proposed settlement in Facebook’s thorny lawsuit with college social-networking rival ConnectU
lead_paragraph: Earlier this year, Facebook reached a settlement in its long-simmering, often embarrassing lawsuit with ConnectU, a Harvard dating site whose founders assert that their one-time employee, a then-college sophomore, Mark Zuckerberg, stole their idea.

headline.main: The Newest Twist in ConnectU v. Facebook
